data.title: Sam Shepard
data.meta_description: See an archive of all sam shepard stories published on Vulture
data.text:
movie review Dec. 8, 2023

Days of Heaven and the Things That Don’t LastTerrence Malick’s 1978 wonder, maybe the most beautiful film of all time, is back in theaters.

theater review May 13, 2019

Theater Review: Blood Without Guts in Curse of the Starving ClassThe play goes all out; this production pulls it back.

photography Mar. 5, 2019

How Ethan Hawke Transforms Into a ‘Cowboy’ Drifter for True West“When you’re doing eight shows a week, the life of an actor becomes very similar to the life of an athlete.”

theater review Jan. 24, 2019

Theater Review: A True West That Simmers Instead of Boiling OverA dose of restraint in a play that typically calls for amped-up intensity.

broadway Mar. 20, 2018

Ethan Hawke and Paul Dano Will Star in Sam Shepard’s True West on BroadwayIt’ll be the first Broadway production of a Sam Shepard play since his death in 2017.

roll clip! Aug. 2, 2017

The Late Sam Shepard Discusses Playwriting in a Clip From California TypewriterShepard is one of many typewriter aficionados who appear in the documentary.

obits July 31, 2017

Sam Shepard, Playwright and Actor, Dead at 73He received the Pulitzer Prize for Drama in 1979 for his play Buried Child.

movie reviews Mar. 18, 2016

Review: Midnight Special’s Supernatural CharmsThe opening is small-scale, which is Nichols’s secret — to move, step by step, from the tightly focused to, in this case, the cosmic.

stage dive Aug. 31, 2012

Theater Review: Sam Shepard’s Heartless“If you thought the RNC was an endless parade of sociopaths, mountebanks, and paranoiac mutterers, wait until you get a load of this.”

casting couch Apr. 5, 2012

Sam Shepard Will Also Join That Stacked Out of the Furnace CastAlongside Christian Bale, Casey Affleck, and Zoe Saldana.

the industry July 9, 2008

Ron Weasley to Play Someone Other Than Ron WeasleyPlus: Stephin Merritt’s Neil Gaiman musical is ready for the stage.
